title: I didn't receive the icon...
body:
I play pretty much every week and even every day, I waited for the icon but never received it, I don't know if it'S a bug but I want the icon ;-;. PLs riot, I'm not even toxic. Ty for answering my post. I feel bad for not receiving it...

-TRIT0

replies.body: Gifts are still coming, and there are a lot of accounts so it's going to be a bit.  Just hang tight until this is all done, and stay up to date on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QYlvdA6q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-23T22:06:06.518+0000)
>
> Gifts are still coming, and there are a lot of accounts so it's going to be a bit.  Just hang tight until this is all done, and stay up to date on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions.

Alright thank you
